title: just got perma banned
body:
Ive only been banned one time before and it was for 14 days ive never said any slurs ive never said anything racist all I flame for is feeding telling people to stop being fuckin stupid, I didn't expect it to go from a fuckin 14 day ban to a straight up perma ban but I guess that's just how it is, im not even mad at this point im just so tired and disappointed in the game the absolute disgusting state of ranked and the fact that I get perma banned for cussing while the throwers and dipshits get to roam free, ive been playing for almost 2 years now and I gotta say the past couple of months have fucking sucked, the game just wasn't fun if I played adc or support then my jungler fed if I play jungle then my adc fed the game just feels hopeless and I know theres 0 chance my fuckin accounts gonna get unblocked because "hurr durr just a game don't flame in chat" im done with this game, I loved the lore and the charactrs but the community and ranked just fuckin sucks, almost every night I played ranked id go to bed feeling pissed and hopeless even if I got off with positive lp

at this point atleast I can actually play games that make me happy
 im not super known on here like laughing fish but incase you know me this is gonna be my last post on the boards as im not gonna post on them if i cant even play the game
and tanksly if youre reading this, im sorry i couldnt get to plat with ivern lol

and to the cass adc that reported me last ranked game because i flamed our 1/8/2 zed who spammed "report pyke" like 20 times then said "i hope you get better as a person" after the round, go fuck yourself
if anyone wants to play with me add me on discord, Rustypug#7194
